title: The NSC Boxset: Heart of Stone
description: Finally, all 12 NSC Industries books, incorporating the Heart of Stone series, in one book.  Follow the Heart of Stone favourites throughout their lives, starting with Nate and Liv in Angel, continuing with Mason and Ava in the complete Heart of Stone series and finishing right at the end with Nativity.  This book contains graphic extreme violence, explicit sex including M/F, M/F/M, M/M and M/F/F/M. It also contains strong language.
author: D.H. Sidebottom
